column1: Genetic & Genomic Counselling (with Work Placement) - MSc(MedSci)
column3: College of Medical, Veterinary & Life Sciences
column5: Designed to give you a working knowledge of the principles and practice of Genetic Counselling qualifying you to practice as a Genetic and Genomic Counsellor.This programme is accredited by the UK Genetic Counsellor Registration Board.
